내가 크게 더하리니: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1a' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.8'/><stop offset='50%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.9'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad1b' x1='0%' y1='100%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFD4E5;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#FFF9C4;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><filter id='glow1'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='4' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow1'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='20'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='5' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.3'/></feComponentTransfer><feMerge><feMergeNode/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='100' rx='70' ry='50' fill='url(#grad1a)' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#shadow1)'/><path d='M 50 100 Q 75 60, 100 80 T 150 100 Q 125 140, 100 120 T 50 100' fill='url(#grad1b)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#glow1)'/><circle cx='70' cy='80' r='25' fill='#E1BEE7' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#glow1)'/><circle cx='130' cy='90' r='30' fill='#B4E7F4' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow1)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='120' rx='40' ry='20' fill='#FFE5B4' opacity='0.8'/></svg>
나무가 먹기에 좋고: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 200 200'><defs><radialGradient id='grad2a'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#C8E6C9;stop-opacity:0.9'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E1BEE7;stop-opacity:0.6'/></radialGradient><linearGradient id='grad2b' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#FFE5B4;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#B4E7F4;stop-opacity:0.8'/></linearGradient><filter id='glow2'><feGaussianBlur stdDeviation='5' result='coloredBlur'/><feMerge><feMergeNode in='coloredBlur'/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter><filter id='shadow2'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceAlpha' stdDeviation='18'/><feOffset dx='0' dy='8' result='offsetblur'/><feComponentTransfer><feFuncA type='linear' slope='0.25'/></feComponentTransfer><feMerge><feMergeNode/><feMergeNode in='SourceGraphic'/></feMerge></filter></defs><ellipse cx='100' cy='60' rx='50' ry='45' fill='url(#grad2a)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#shadow2)'/><path d='M 80 50 Q 100 30, 120 50 Q 130 70, 120 90 Q 100 110, 80 90 Q 70 70, 80 50' fill='#C8E6C9' opacity='0.7' filter='url(#glow2)'/><rect x='90' y='100' width='20' height='50' rx='10' fill='url(#grad2b)' opacity='0.8' filter='url(#shadow2)'/><ellipse cx='100' cy='45' rx='30' ry='25' fill='#FFD4E5' opacity='0.6' filter='url(#glow2)'/><circle cx='85' cy='60' r='15' fill='#FFF9C4' opacity='0.7'/></svg>
